taj_mahal.name: Taj Mahal
taj_mahal.description: A white marble mausoleum built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his wife Mumtaz Mahal. It is considered one of the finest examples of Mughal architecture and a symbol of India's rich history.

khajuraho.name: Khajuraho Group of Monuments
khajuraho.description: A group of Hindu and Jain temples known for their intricate sculptures and architectural excellence. The temples are famous for their erotic sculptures and are considered masterpieces of Indian art.

hampi.name: Hampi Ruins
hampi.description: The ruins of the medieval city of Vijayanagara, once the capital of the Vijayanagara Empire. The site contains numerous monuments, temples, and other structures spread across a vast area.
